name: Project M - Assassin's Creed Fan Game
name_original: Project M - Assassin's Creed Fan Game
description:
Discover the Great City of Baghdad, as it was 1000 years ago ! Walk through an impressive city, full of marvelous places to visit. Watch the beauty of markets, fountains, and the gorgeous Palace !

This project was my first project on Unreal Engine 5, as well as my first time using this software. It was made in 2 months, with a budget of 200$.

This project is an experience where you will be able to explore an Ancient City, by walking, running, or even climbing !

You can find more about the breakdown of this project on this video (French) : 



Minimum System Requirements :

CPU : Intel Core i5 8400 2.8 GHz, AMD Ryzen 5 2600 3.4 GHz

GPU : Nvidia Geforce GTX 1660

RAM : 12GB

Hard Disk Space : 2GB

OS : Windows 10 or 11
